comments.body: Just as a general bit of refactoring, we may want to consider factoring out some of this model logging boilerplate into a helper function and using it in all the other functions in this test too.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +110,114 @@        "mlflow.models.model.get_databricks_runtime", return_value=dbr
    ):
        sig = ModelSignature(
            inputs=Schema([ColSpec("integer", "x"), ColSpec("integer", "y")]),
            outputs=Schema([ColSpec(name=None, type="double")]),
